Detailed Description

Interface for object that accepts steal request with instance reification

Instances of class that inherits from StealableWithInstanceReification can reify the steal method by providing a object that implements StealAlgorithm using an invocation of reify method.

Each such instances can have a specialized StealAlgorithm that reify invocation to the method steal.

See also:
StealAlgorithm
